@richhiggins @JamesMcCormack @Netlify Thanks Rich! There certainly is a lot of choice. That's one of the reasons I favor #JAMstack sites. You have a lot of portability and can avoid lock-in. Always nice to use a service because it is then best for you rather than because it is hard to leave!
